channel.title: 2010/07 on Ian Wootten
channel.description: Recent content in 2010/07 on Ian Wootten

item.title: How not to: Do A Hack Day
item.description: It’s been well over a month since I attended science hack day and I’d thought I’d put out some notes on my time there. Rather than do a run down of the event, for which I’m sure there’s far more comprehensive blog posts available already, I thought I’d share my experiences based on attendance of a number of different hack events I’ve been to over the years. I went with the full intention of doing some hardcore hacking, but didn’t entirely meet my own expectations.
